summary: This mod fixes the bright glowing effect on Chesko's Wearable Lanterns mod.  It is based on his 3.0b version.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=6][u]Introduction:[/u][/size][/color]

What is this mod? It's a lighting fix for Chesko's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/?]Wearable Lanterns[/url] mod. <-- Click that link to read
all about his mod. Everything you need to know is there.

Check the screenshot images to see what this fix does. It has a before and after.  It removes the
bright white glowing effect around the player and lanterns, giving it a more natural lighting.  This
is applied to all lantern types.  :)


[color=#ffff00][size=6][u]Requirements:[/u][/size][/color]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/?]Wearable Lanterns 3.0b[/url]


[color=#ffff00][size=6][u]Compatibility:[/u][/size][/color]

This mod can be used with other "Wearable Lanterns" upgrades, including:

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34535/?]Wearable Lanterns SMIM Patch[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52348/?]Glass fix for Cheskos Wearable Lanterns[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19912/?]Wearable Lanterns Firefly Torchbug pet file replacer[/url]


[color=#00ff00][size=6][u]Installing:[/u][/size][/color]

1. Download and install Chesko's mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/?]Wearable Lanterns[/url].  Get version 3.0b.
2. Download this fix, and copy+paste the "Meshes" folder into the Skyrim\Data directory.
3. Enjoy!


[color=#00ff00][size=6][u]Credits:[/u][/size][/color]

Chesko - created the original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/?]Wearable Lanterns[/url] mod.
author: IcePenguin

files.name: Wearable Lanterns - Lighting Fix
files.changelogHtml: Fixes the lighting in Chesko's Wearable Lanterns mod.
